name: isDateObject
description: Checks if the given value is a date / time object. The difference between isDateObject and isDate is that the latter returns true for date / time objects as well as date / time strings.

params.name: value
params.description: A value to test whether it's a date object

examples.title: Check if date is a date OBJECT, not just a date string
examples.code:
<cfscript>
    date = IsDateObject(now());
    writeOutput("Can string be converted to a date/time value : " & date);
</cfscript>
examples.result: Can string be converted to a date/time value : YES
